mapper.select: SELECT T_ID, T_NAME, T_ICON_ID FROM THEME_TBL
SELECT A.L_ID, L_NAME, L_ADDR, PRICE AS basic_price, W_PRICE AS weekend_price, PIC_URL AS main_pic FROM LODGING_TBL A INNER JOIN LODGING_PIC_TBL B ON A.L_ID = B.L_ID WHERE PIC_MAIN = '1'

SELECT L_ID, A.USER_EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL, L_NAME, L_ADDR, C.S_NAME AS BUILDING_CODE, TO_CHAR(CHECKIN, 'HH24:MI') AS CHECKIN, TO_CHAR(CHECKOUT, 'HH24:MI') AS CHECKOUT, BATH_EA, BEDROOM_EA, BED_EA, L_EXP, BASIC_PERSON, ADD_PERSON, PRICE AS BASIC_PRICE, W_PRICE AS WEEKEND_PRICE FROM LODGING_TBL A INNER JOIN USER_TBL B ON A.USER_EMAIL = B.USER_EMAIL INNER JOIN STRUCTURE_TBL C ON A.S_ID = C.S_ID WHERE L_ID = #{l_id}
SELECT PIC_URL FROM LODGING_TBL A INNER JOIN LODGING_PIC_TBL B ON A.L_ID = B.L_ID WHERE A.L_ID = #{l_id}
SELECT C.F_NAME FROM LODGING_TBL A INNER JOIN LODGING_FACILITY_TBL B ON A.L_ID = B.L_ID INNER JOIN FACILITY_TBL C ON B.F_ID = C.F_ID WHERE A.L_ID = #{l_id}
